text.title: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free

head.s: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free

p.s: When gas prices go up most people think more about getting better gas mileage .
Many people think that it is hard and/or expensive to improve their gas mileage .
The truth is that is it easy to improve gas mileage .
Keep reading to find out how to boost fuel mileage for free !

list.item:
Keep track of your fuel mileage .
When you are at the gas station keep the receipt .
After you fill up with gas make sure to reset your trip meter to 0 .
You can calculate your fuel mileage by dividing the driven distance by the amount of fuel used .
Keep a record .
There is no way to tell how much your mileage has improved unless you keep a record .

item.s: Get in the right mindset when you drive .
Think about how much fuel you are using when you are driving .
Always keep it in your mind until you get in the habit of driving for fuel economy and not for speed .

figure.rend: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free Step 2.jpg

item.s: Avoid idling .
Sometimes it is necessary but keep it to a minimum .
When you start your car in the morning do n't let it sit and idle for 10 minutes , you are using gas and getting 0 miles/kilometers per gallon !

figure.rend: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free Step 3.jpg

item.s: Do n't be the first one off of the line at a stop light .
Most of the time the people who are off of the line first are also the first ones to slam on their brakes at the next stop light .
This is a huge waste of fuel .

figure.rend: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free Step 4.jpg

item.s: Watch the road way ahead .
If you see the traffic light turn red or cars brake lights coming on then take your foot off the accelerator and let your car coast .
By doing this you are using the momentum that you already have ( from using gas to get your car up to speed ) to get to the next stopping place .

figure.rend: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free Step 5.jpg

item.s: Drive slower .
Your car is most efficient around .
After that you are wasting fuel .
Drive as close to as possible when it is appropriate .

figure.rend: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free Step 6.jpg

item.s: Take the route that is the shortest and has fewer stop lights .
The longer you are driving and the more you are sitting at stop lights the more fuel you are using .

figure.rend: Improve Your Gas Mileage for Free Step 7.jpg

item.s: Have a goal .
If your goal is to get 15 % better gas mileage then you will be more likely to get there .
Think about how much money you are saving by driving differently .
This will help you justify it .
Try not to be in a big hurry when you drive .
If you can drive slower and think about how much fuel you are using you will be able to save more .
Drive a car that gets good mileage .
Some people have multiple cars and like driving one over the other for various reasons , but it might be worth it to use the one that gets better mileage .
